translation.en: Oldest relic gets two extra points. Come on!
translation.es: La reliquia más antigua ganará dos puntos extra. ¡Vamos!

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. Could you be any bossier?
- Excuse me? Bossier. Really? - Yeah.
What's next? Shrill? Or am I being too difficult for you?
translation.es: ¿Qué sigue? ¿Amargada? ¿O que tengo un carácter difícil?

translation.en: You left that out of your Misogyny 101 class.
translation.es: Se te olvidó lo que aprendiste en tu clase de Misoginia 101.

translation.en: What? Do you have something to say?
I'm just so scared right now.
Hey, what about this Egyptian exhibit?
Anything Egyptian would be the oldest relic by far.
translation.es: Cualquier cosa egipcia calificaría como la reliquia más antigua.

translation.en: - Guys? - Psst.
I think I may be able to help you.
Overheard about your scavenger hunt.
translation.es: Escuché sobre su búsqueda de tesoro.

translation.en: You were looking at the Egyptian posters.
translation.es: Estabas viendo el cartel de Egipto.

translation.en: - When does it open? - Oh, that's the problem, two weeks.
translation.es: - ¿Cuándo se estrena? - Ese es el problema. En dos semanas.

translation.en: They're unloading it today in the basement.
translation.es: Lo están desempacando en el sótano.

translation.en: Look…
If it means that much to you, there may be a way for you to get down there.
translation.es: Si tanto te interesa, tal vez haya un modo de bajar.

translation.en: This best not be some wild goose chase.
translation.es: Ojalá no sea como atrapar gansos salvajes.

translation.en: I sure hope it is. I love chasing wild geese.
translation.es: Espero que lo sea. Me encanta perseguir gansos salvajes.

translation.en: Until you catch one. Then it is not fun.
translation.es: Hasta que atrapas uno. Entonces ya no es divertido.

translation.en: A caught goose is just the meanest!
Well, it's grouped by origin, so
translation.es: Está agrupado por orígenes. Lo del antiguo Egipto debe estar en este pasillo.

translation.en: the Ancient Egyptian stuff should be in this aisle.
translation.es: Lo del antiguo Egipto debe estar en este pasillo.

translation.en: - Hi. - Oh, no, she's been caught!
And I can totally explain why I'm here.
translation.es: Puedo explicarle por qué estoy aquí.

translation.en: - Someone's coming. - Come with me, miss.
Hide! Hide!
- Where? - There, there, there!
Look what I found sneaking around.
Ah. An interloper.
A thief.
Or maybe an explorer.
- Hola, Dora. - Hi, I'm Dora, and--
- Wait, you already knew my name? -
Hey. You gotta help me.
I guess we win the scavenger hunt.
What? Hey, no.
Let me go!
- Hey, no! - Wait, wait, wait, wait.
- What's going on? - Is this a scavenger hunt?
What are you guys doing in here?
Sleep tight, Dora, and when you wake up,
translation.es: Que duermas bien, Dora. Cuando despiertes…

translation.en: you will help us find your parents, and then Parapata.
translation.es: nos ayudarás a buscar a tus padres y luego… Parapata.

translation.en: What's happening?
Where are we?
I think we're being unloaded from a plane.
translation.es: Creo que nos están bajando de un avión.

translation.en: We're not on a plane. We can't--
translation.es: No estamos en un avión. No podemos…

translation.en: Oh, my God, we're on a plane! Oh--
We've left the country without ID. We need to alert the US consulate.
translation.es: Dejamos el país sin identificación. Hay que avisar al consulado.

translation.en: Dora, what happened?
- They're treasure hunters? - Why did I take Mandarin?
translation.es: ¿Son cazadores de tesoros? ¿Por qué estudié mandarín? ¿Qué están diciendo?

translation.en: - What are you guys saying? -
We gotta get out of here.
Oh, look, Dora brought a knife on the field trip, everybody.
translation.es: Miren, Dora trajo un cuchillo al museo.

translation.en: I see three mercenaries. Armed.
Wait, there's a fourth.
I think he saw me.
- He's coming for us. - Ah!
Okay. I am not here. I'm an avatar.
translation.es: Yo no estoy. Soy un avatar.

translation.en: Dora! It is you!
- Who are you? - I'm a friend of your parents.
translation.es: - ¿Quién es usted? - Un amigo de tus padres.

translation.en: I'm rescuing you, Dora!
Come with me if you want to live--
- Where did he go? - Did… did he die?
I'm okay! I'm okay. I need your help.
But we have to run. Now!
- Boss! - Get them!
My parents did not sign a permission slip for the jungle!
translation.es: ¡Mis papás no firmaron un permiso para ir a la selva!

translation.en: Why are we here?
Where's the museum? Why, why, why?
- How do we get out of here? - I don't know!
Getting you out of the box was as far as my plan went.
translation.es: ¡Mi plan era liberarlos y hasta ahí llegó!

translation.en: Huh! Swiper, at the ready!
Whatever happens, get that map.
translation.es: Pase lo que pase, trae ese mapa.

translation.en: Swiper, yes, swiping.
- What kind of rescue is this? - It's the only one you've got.
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de rescate es este? ¡Es el único que hay!

translation.en: Here. Let me try.
Hola. What the--
Hey! That fox just swiped my map!
Where is it? Where is it? Where is it?
What part of, The fox just swiped my map don't you understand? Come on, help me!
translation.es: ¿Qué parte de el zorro se llevó mi mapa no entienden? ¡Ayúdenme!

translation.en: Gotcha! There you are, my little friend.
No swiping, you… you swiper!
She's amazing.
- - Oh, shoot!
Man! I'm stuck upside- down.
Swiper, no--
- Good job, Swiper. - I know, man.
translation.es: - Bien hecho, Zorro. - Ya lo sé.

translation.en: Get her!
Dora!
- Now what do we do? - Come on, come on!
- Where did our rescuer go? - He ran away!
- Get in! - Open this door, man!
- Get in! - I'm not joking, man!
Viper, get the truck! Don't let them escape!
translation.es: Viper, ¡trae la camioneta! ¡No dejes que se escapen!

translation.en: - Hold on! - Oh!
Sorry!
Are they following?
Where have they gone?
This is the only road for miles. Keep your eyes peeled.
translation.es: ¡Esta es la única carretera! ¡Abran bien los ojos!

translation.en: Not anymore.
Are you kids okay?
- Not really. - Not really?
Understatement of the century.
I was just kidnapped and chased by bad guys!
And a fox with a mask! Everyone saw that, right?
translation.es: Y un zorro… ¡con máscara! Todos lo vieron, ¿no?

translation.en: Like, why does that fox need to remain anonymous?
Who is gonna recognize one specific fox?
- Mm. - How did you know my name?
You were an infant the last time I saw you.
translation.es: Eras un bebé la última vez que te vi.

translation.en: My name is Alejandro Gutierrez. I'm a professor of ancient languages
translation.es: Me llamo Alejandro Gutiérrez. Soy un profesor de lenguas antiguas en la Universidad San Marcos, en Lima, Perú.

translation.en: at San Marcos University in Lima, Peru.
translation.es: Soy un profesor de lenguas antiguas en la Universidad San Marcos, en Lima, Perú.

translation.en: Your parents and I were in constant contact during their time here.
translation.es: Tus padres y yo teníamos mucho contacto cuando estuvieron aquí.

translation.en: Then two weeks ago, your parents' calls stopped.
translation.es: Hace dos semanas, dejaron de llamar.

translation.en: Since then… silencio.
- That means silence. - Yeah. I got that one.
They haven't answered any of my sat phone call for weeks, either.
translation.es: Tampoco han contestado mis llamadas desde hace unas semanas.

translation.en: Your father sent me this just a week before, in case I could help.
translation.es: Tu papá me envió esto una semana antes, por si podía ayudar.

translation.en: Ah, Papi's journal!
So I came here to make sure they were okay.
translation.es: Vine aquí, para ver si estaban bien.

translation.en: Tracked them this far.
I've been staking it out, hoping for a sign from them.
translation.es: Estuve haciendo tiempo, esperando alguna señal de ellos.

translation.en: And then I saw you poke your head out of that crate
translation.es: Luego vi tu cabeza asomarse de esa caja,

translation.en: and I-- I said to myself, Dora!
translation.es: y me dije a mí mismo: ¡Dora!.

translation.en: Dora the kidnapped teenager!
But how did you recognize me?
Well, you look sort of exactly the same.
But I'm afraid I have no idea where to find your parents.
translation.es: Pero me temo que no sé dónde encontrar a tus papás.

translation.en: Don't worry. I can track my parents in the jungle.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Puedo rastrear a mis papás en la jungla.

translation.en: - Let's go! - Ho… Hold up.
Or we could call the local police
translation.es: O podríamos llamar a la policía local

translation.en: and-- and have them come rescue us with, like, a SWAT team.
translation.es: y que vengan a rescatarnos con un equipo SWAT.

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah, that sounds like another solid option.
translation.es: Sí, eso parece otro plan viable.

translation.en: Of course!
Hello? 911? Can you please come and get us?
We're at the corner of Rain and Forest.
translation.es: Estamos en la esquina de Selva y Tropical.

translation.en: Okay, I get it! I just want to go home.
translation.es: ¡Ya entendí! Solo quiero irme a mi casa.

translation.en: We're gonna die out here.
Look around you.
This is the kind of place where people die.
translation.es: Es la clase de lugar en que uno muere.

translation.en: I mean, in a way, every place is the kind of place where people die.
translation.es: Si lo piensas, la gente muere en todos los lugares.

translation.en: - Okay, well, that's a bummer notion. - Guys, guys.
translation.es: - Bueno, eso es deprimente. - Chicos, chicos.

translation.en: Listen, finding Dora's parents is our best chance of getting home.
translation.es: Oigan. Hallar a los papás de Dora es la mejor opción para regresar a casa.

translation.en: My aunt and uncle will know what to do.
Dora's my cousin, I can't just let her go off with some
translation.es: Dora es mi prima. No puedo dejar que se vaya con un tipo…

translation.en: strange and anxious man we just met.
translation.es: …raro y desesperado que acabamos de conocer.

translation.en: Thank you, Diego.
Now let's go find Dora's parents.
translation.es: Busquemos a los padres de Dora.

translation.en: Look! In there! That's their car!
Here. This is it. Our family symbol.
translation.es: Aquí. Miren esto. Es nuestro símbolo familiar.

translation.en: - This is where they started hiking. - Are we there?
Where are your parents? I don't see your parents.
translation.es: ¿Dónde están tus padres? No veo a tus padres.

translation.en: We can't go any further by car.
- The jungle gets too dense. - So, how do we--
translation.es: - La jungla es muy espesa. - Entonces, ¿cómo…?

translation.en: We must enter the jungle on foot.
translation.es: Debemos entrar en la jungla a pie.

translation.en: Luckily, I prepared for this possibility.
translation.es: Por suerte, me preparé para esta posibilidad.

translation.en: Okay, I may have gone a little overboard on supplies.
translation.es: Tal vez se me pasó la mano con las provisiones.

translation.en: Be my guest.
This is a legit nightmare!
I-- I'm not going in first, though. You go first, Dora. It feels right.
translation.es: No seré el primero en entrar. Tú primero, Dora. Es lo correcto.

translation.en: You all have nothing to worry about.
translation.es: No tienen nada de qué preocuparse.

translation.en: The jungle is perfectly safe!
Just don't touch anything. Or breathe too deeply.
translation.es: Solo no toquen nada ni respiren hondo.

translation.en: Are you sure your parents went this way?
translation.es: ¿Estás segura de que tus padres fueron por aquí?

translation.en: Okay, what are these?
Warning signs.
Totems.
Legend tells of a deadly ancient militia
translation.es: La leyenda habla de una antigua y mortal milicia

translation.en: dedicated to protecting Parapata from outside eyes.
translation.es: dedicada a proteger Parapata de los forasteros.

translation.en: No one has seen Los Guardianes Perdidos…
translation.es: Nadie ha visto a los Guardianes perdidos…

translation.en: The Lost Guardians, for centuries.
- What was that? - Quechua.
- Ancient Inca. Impressive. - What does it mean?
All those that seek Parapata…
shall surely perish.
Okay, I am ready for my parents to come and get me now.
translation.es: Estoy listo para que mis padres vengan por mí.

translation.en: You have nothing to worry about.
translation.es: No hay nada de qué preocuparse.

translation.en: I promise. I mean, there's no need to overreact.
translation.es: Te lo prometo. Digo, no hay por qué exagerar.

translation.en: Get it off! Get it off! Get it off!
And that was just an example of the dangers of overreacting.
translation.es: Y eso fue un ejemplo de los peligros de exagerar.

translation.en: - - You okay? Fine. Totally fine.
Hey. I found one of those red loops.
translation.es: Oigan. Encontré uno de esos símbolos rojos.

translation.en: My parents' symbol.
- We must be getting close. - Oh, thank you, thank you!
We're going home.
This is my parents' camp.
translation.es: Este es el campamento de mis padres.

translation.en: Or was. I mean, this is their stuff.
translation.es: O lo era. Estas son sus cosas.

translation.en: - Someone's watching. -
I can feel it.
- Kill it! Quickly, kill it! - Boots! Oh!
Oh, Boots, I'm so happy to see you!
She knows this monkey?
Of course, she knows this monkey.
translation.es: Claro que conoce a ese mono.

translation.en: Thank goodness.
- He saw them. -
Oh, sorry. Um, this is Boots. Boots, these are, um, my friends.
translation.es: Perdón. Este es Botas. Botas, ellos son… mis amigos.

translation.en: - They're here to help me. - No. We're here to get saved.
translation.es: Están aquí para ayudarme. No. Para ser salvados.

translation.en: Oh, and FYI, we are not friends.
translation.es: Y, por cierto, no somos amigas.

translation.en: They did this quickly.
- See how they rushed it? - Yeah.
Still, I can track my parents better than any mercenaries.
translation.es: Aun así puedo rastrear a mis padres mejor que los mercenarios.

translation.en: We just have to get to them first.
Uh. May we stop for a moment? I need to do a thing.
translation.es: ¿Podemos parar un momento? Necesito hacer algo.

translation.en: - What? - Just a thing.
What thing?
I know what this is.
- You have to poo. - No. That isn't it.
translation.es: - Tienes que hacer popis. - No. Eso no es.

translation.en: Of course I have to poo! I haven't pooed in 48 hours!
translation.es: ¡Claro que sí! ¡No lo he hecho en 48 horas!

translation.en: I'm sweating, and every step is agony!
translation.es: ¡Estoy sudando y cada paso es una agonía!

translation.en: Well, don't look at me cover your ears!
Probably should've said cover your ears before you said poo like, 47 times.
translation.es: Debiste decir tápense los oídos antes de decir popis 47 veces.

translation.en: - - There's no need to be afraid.
translation.es: No hay por qué tener miedo.

translation.en: I have an idea.
- Let's turn this into a song. - Let's not.
You know what? I think it's passed.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Creo que se me pasó.

translation.en: Why don't we just go back to the group, and we can just--
translation.es: ¿Por qué no volvemos con los demás y podemos…?

translation.en: Seriously? You had that in your backpack, too?
A poo shovel.
It's time to dig the poo hole
translation.es: Es hora de cavar para esa popis

translation.en: - Dig, dig, dig -
Just grab a shovel It's a piece of cake
translation.es: Agarra una pala, es pan comido

translation.en: Make sure the hole is deep And there isn't a snake
translation.es: Asegúrate de que sea hondo Y que no haya una serpiente

translation.en: I'm telling you this So you will be wiser
And don't forget It's a natural fertilizer
translation.es: Y no lo olvides Es un buen fertilizante

translation.en: I believe in you, Sammy. I believe that you can do this.
translation.es: Tengo fe en ti, Sammy. Creo que puedes hacerlo.

translation.en: Also, medically, you have to do this.
translation.es: Además, por tu salud, debes hacerlo.

translation.en: - - Okay, bye! Come on, Boots.
She's good.
There's nothing to be afraid of.
Not good. Not good at all.
translation.es: Esto no es bueno. No es nada bueno.

translation.en: - Go, go, go! -
Real arrows flying at us! Real arrows flying at us!
Dig the poo hole
Dig, dig, dig
- Run! - Look away! Look away!
- Sorry, no time! - We saw nothing!
- Run for your life! - We gotta go!
- What is happening? - It's the curse!
The curse is gonna perish us. We're gonna perish all over the place!
translation.es: ¡La maldición nos perecerá! ¡Va a ser una perecedera!

translation.en: There, there! Follow me!
This way!
I'm hit! They hit me! I'm bleeding out!
I am losing life force!
Oh, no, no, no! No, it's a juice box. It's just a juice box.
I think we're safe. For now.
translation.es: Creo que estamos a salvo… por ahora.

translation.en: - - Not safe. Not safe! Not safe!
I want to go home! I want to go home!
I'm okay! I'm okay!
Guys…
I can't say for sure…
because I'm… I'm fairly confident I just sustained a…
translation.es: porque estoy bastante seguro de que sufrí una lesión cerebral seria

translation.en: a serious brain injury, but I do believe…
translation.es: porque estoy bastante seguro de que sufrí una lesión cerebral seria pero sí creo…

translation.en: we may have just met Los Guardianes Perdidos.
translation.es: que nos topamos con los Guardianes perdidos.

translation.en: The Lost Guardians.
I thought you said they were just legends.
These are the same Inca sun symbols that were on those totems.
translation.es: Son los mismos símbolos incas que había en los tótems.

translation.en: So these are like, legit arrows?
Like, kill- people arrows?
The markings are quite authentic.
Hey, you okay?
Okay?
Okay? No, I'm not okay, okay? I want to go home!
translation.es: ¿Bien? No, no estoy bien. ¡Quiero irme a mi casa!

translation.en: I want to be staring at my phone, in an ice- cold room,
translation.es: ¡Quiero estar viendo mi celular, en un cuarto helado

translation.en: drinking a frozen coffee beverage!
And I know that makes me sound real basic, but that is what I want!
translation.es: ¡Sé que me hace sonar muy básica, pero eso es lo que quiero!

translation.en: Oh, and by the way, the poo song lied.
translation.es: Y por cierto, tu canción de la popis mintió.

translation.en: Yeah, it was totally dangerous, arrows rained down on me.
I hate it here!
And I can't even storm off 'cause this jungle will eat me!
translation.es: ¡Ni siquiera puedo hacer berrinche porque esta jungla me devorará!

translation.en: Maybe a song will help.
It's okay to freak out sometimes
- It's really okay… - No more songs!
translation.es: Está bien perder el control… ¡No… más… canciones!

translation.en: Okay.
Are you here to yell at me, too?
Nah. Actually, I'm here to avoid getting yelled at.
translation.es: No. De hecho, vine para que no me griten a mí.

translation.en: It's scary to be responsible for other people.
translation.es: Da miedo hacerse responsable de otros.

translation.en: It's easier when you're alone.
Is it?
Look, I know she can be like, a real pain in the butt sometimes, but…
translation.es: Sé que puede ser muy molesta a veces, pero…

translation.en: she's not all bad, I guess.
You have an attraction for her.
What? No.
No, I definitely never said that.
You know, a life- threatening situation
can often accelerate the mating process in many species!
translation.es: puede acelerar el apareamiento en muchas especies.

translation.en: Okay, no. Just slow your roll.
And please don't ever say the word mating again.
translation.es: Y no vuelvas a decir apareamiento.

translation.en: - Ever. - Mm. Mm- hmm.
Let's just get out of here.
- Are we even going the right way? -
What?
Fox tracks.
I scouted the area. There's a freshly cut path to the north,
translation.es: Exploré el área. Hay un camino reciente al norte, ruinas hacia el este.

translation.en: some ruins to the east.
translation.es: Hay un camino reciente al norte, ruinas hacia el este.

translation.en: Did you find any more of their markings?
translation.es: - ¿Encontraste más de sus marcas rojas? - No.

translation.en: - No. - Okay, then we head north.  That's the path they took.
translation.es: - Entonces vamos al norte. - Es el camino que tomaron.

translation.en: - Hi, guys! -
What was that?
What, you're scared of monkeys now?
Monkeys can carry three times their body weight.
translation.es: Los monos pueden cargar tres veces su peso.

translation.en: So that's a yes? Viper's scared of monkeys.
translation.es: ¿O sea que sí? A Viper le asustan los monos.

translation.en: It's just a monkey fact.
translation.es: Solo es un dato sobre monos.

translation.en: That's all it is.
Where are those guys?
They're definitely dead. It's just you and me now.
translation.es: Seguro están muertos. Solo quedamos tú y yo.

translation.en: - Of course, we'll have to start a family. - We are not starting a family.
translation.es: Claro, tendremos que empezar una familia. No empezaremos una familia.

translation.en: Eh, give it a few days.
Uh! Hey! Where have you guys been?
- Hi, guys. - Look, I'm really sorry, Dora.
It's fine. It's fine, Sammy.
We saw the mercenaries. They're ahead of us.
translation.es: Vimos a los mercenarios. Nos llevan ventaja.

translation.en: We'll have to follow the mercenaries from a safe distance.
translation.es: Hay que seguir a los mercenarios a una distancia segura.

translation.en: No. We're not following them. My parents didn't go that way.
translation.es: No. No los seguiremos. Mis papás no se fueron por ahí.

translation.en: My father says that the way to Parapata passes through an opera house.
translation.es: Mi papá dice que el camino a Parapata pasa por una casa de ópera.

translation.en: The opera house was built hundreds of years ago by Europeans during the rubber boom.
translation.es: Los europeos la construyeron hace siglos durante la fiebre del caucho.

translation.en: There'll be nothing but ruins by now.
This is the way they went.
This must be it.
Or was it.
It doesn't look like any opera singers have been here for a while.
translation.es: Parece que hace mucho que no hay funciones.

translation.en: Yeah.
The Europeans may have built it, but…
the jungle has taken it back.
- - Ew, my feet.
Why does the ground feel like chocolate pudding?
translation.es: ¿Por qué el piso parece postre de chocolate?

translation.en: - - Excuse me.
- - Wait, wait, wait!
I ate a lot of frijoles and chimichangas.
- I ate chile con carne. -
I ate mucho pozole.
Wait. Anyone else notice the walls are getting higher?
translation.es: Esperen. ¿Les parece que las paredes se están poniendo más altas?

translation.en: - Quicksand! -
- You got to be kidding me! - Quicksand really exists?
I thought it was just a video game thing. Like Pitfall!
translation.es: Pensé que era solo en videojuegos. Como en Pitfall.

translation.en: - It's a classic. - How do we get out of this stuff?
translation.es: Es un clásico. ¿Cómo salimos de aquí?

translation.en: Okay, rule number one of quicksand, don't panic.
You'll only get sucked in further. Lie down flat on your back.
translation.es: Solo se hundirán más rápido. Recuéstense.

translation.en: You have to distribute your weight.
Okay. All right.
No, no, no. I'm not doing that.
Yeah. No, this feels super wrong.
Now make little movements with your legs
translation.es: Ahora muevan un poco las piernas…

translation.en: to make space for the water to get between the sand.
translation.es: para que el agua se meta entre la arena.

translation.en: And once your legs are free, simply backstroke out of the quicksand.
translation.es: Al liberar las piernas, naden de espalda hasta salir.

translation.en: Oh, give me a break. We're gonna die in here.
Look, look! It's working! It's working!
Come on.
Thanks.
- Help me! - Alejandro, you have to stop moving.
translation.es: ¡Ayúdenme! Alejandro, deja de moverte. Quédate quie…

translation.en: Stay sti--
translation.es: Alejandro, deja de moverte. Quédate quie…

translation.en: Why have you all gone quiet?
It's bad, isn't it?
Oh, no! Shoo!
Cha!  No, no, no! Not on the face.
- It's another male. They will now fight. - No, no!
translation.es: Es otro macho. Van a pelear. ¡No!

translation.en: I'm not sure those guys are fighting.
Oh, it's a female.
They are not fighting. They are mating!
translation.es: No están peleando. Se están apareando.

translation.en: - Get it off! - Quick, someone go get a branch.
- I'm sinking! - No, no, wait!
Guys, come back!
It's a jungle full of trees and I can't find a branch.
translation.es: ¡Está lleno de árboles, y no encuentro una rama!

translation.en: Oh, oh, no!
Alejandro! Alejandro!
I see feet. Human feet!
Over here!

you were my best friend…
and my-- my first friend.

this is our next adventure, prima.

translation.en: of that which is most revered.
translation.es: de lo que es más valioso.

translation.en: What did the Inca revere the most?
That's easy!
The same as me.
Gold.
Oh, crud.
Thanks for getting through the tough stuff for me.
translation.es: Gracias por superar todos los obstáculos por mí.

translation.en: Once again, I only had to follow Miss Know- It- All,
translation.es: Otra vez, solo tuve que seguir a doña Sabelotodo,

translation.en: and she led me straight to the gold.
translation.es: y ella me trajo directo al oro.

translation.en: Gold. Gold!
Lots and lots of gold!
The answer to the puzzle is obvious.
translation.es: La respuesta al acertijo es obvia.

translation.en: The Incas built monuments to their gods with it.
translation.es: Los incas construyeron monumentos a los dioses con él.

translation.en: Gold is as close to touching the sun as the Incas could get.
translation.es: El oro es lo más cercano a tocar el sol para los incas.

translation.en: It's happening!  It's happening!
It's happening!
I beat you! I won!
I beat you, I won! I beat you, I won! Ha!
The treasure is going to be mine!
You were wrong about me, Alejandro.
I'm not a know- it- all.
But by now, I do know you.
translation.es: pero a estas alturas, ya te conozco.

translation.en: I knew that you would follow us in here.
translation.es: Sabía que nos seguirías hasta acá.

translation.en: And I knew that you would let us take all the risk for you.
translation.es: Y sabía que dejarías que nos arriesgáramos por ti.

translation.en: I knew the final Inca test would carry
dire consequences for those who should fail it.
Which is why we are over here, and you…
translation.es: Es por eso que nosotros estamos aquí, y tú…

translation.en: Well, you're standing right there.
I'm still alive!
Powell! Viper!
Help me! Get in here! Now!
My mercenaries are on their way.
This isn't over yet!
- Dora! - Oh, honey!
- Mami! Papi! I'm so sorry. -
It's fine. How cool is this?
Look at these guys, that's a real crossbow.
translation.es: Miren a estos tipos. Es una ballesta de verdad.

translation.en: Honey. That's a real crossbow, yep.
It's the Lost Guardians of Parapata.
translation.es: Son los Guardianes perdidos de Parapata.

translation.en: Ridiculous! There are no lost guardians. I made them up.
translation.es: ¡Ridículo! No existen los Guardianes. Yo los inventé.

translation.en: No, they're super real, bro.
I think this is when we perish.
translation.es: Creo que aquí es dónde nos morimos.

translation.en: - - Dora!
- Be strong, honey, okay? - You choose the right thing.
- - Yep.
- - She did it.
- Thank you. Yeah. - Thank you.
Honey.
It's like nothing I've…
- ever imagined. - Ever imagined.
It's breathtaking.
Monkey.
Really big gold monkey.
translation.es: Un mono muy grande de oro.

translation.en: Say goodbye to your little friend.
What is happening?
- Swiper! - Adiós, losers!
Everyone get out of here!
- What about the gold? - It doesn't matter!
Wait, guys! What about me?
You can't leave me here!
Dora! Randy! Help me!
We're a team! Guys!
Dora, come on!
I knew the answer was water!
Can you give me another go?
I was joking about the gold! Of course not gold!
translation.es: ¡Lo del oro era broma! ¡Claro que el oro no!

translation.en: Water is precious!
Honey, let's go!
And you'll never find it now, man!
We gotta go! I love Parapata, but I don't want to be stuck here forever.
translation.es: Tenemos que irnos. Amo Parapata, pero no para quedarme para siempre.

translation.en: - Boots! - Get off me, monkey!
Oh, man. The indignity!
That's it.
- Dora, no! - Dora, wait!
What are you doing?
- Oh, wow. -
Dora! You did it!
Should we put up a sign saying, Choose the water?
- - No? Okay.
Hey.
Look, I know we weren't exactly friends when this trip started, but I--
translation.es: Sé que no éramos amigos cuando este viaje empezó.

translation.en: I like you, too.
- Dora's staring at us again, isn't she? - Yeah.
translation.es: - Dora nos observa otra vez, ¿verdad? - Sí.

translation.en: Okay.
Mom, Dad!
We have some exciting news.
We're going back into the jungle in a few weeks.
translation.es: Volveremos a la jungla en unas semanas.

translation.en: We'll be gone for a few months, no contact, - just us against the elements. - Mm- hmm.
translation.es: Nos iremos unos meses, sin contacto. Solo nosotros contra los elementos.

translation.en: Me and your mom.
And you.
We're onto something big, Dora.
About that.
Someone pulled a lever, not sure who, but--
translation.es: Alguien tiró de la palanca. No sé quién, pero…

translation.en: - You. You! - You know who it was.
I think…
I think I want to go back to the city.
translation.es: Creo que quiero volver a la ciudad.

translation.en: I know the jungle pretty well.
- Okay. - But, um, high school…
I think I need more time to study that culture.
translation.es: Creo que necesito más tiempo para estudiar esa cultura…

translation.en: And its indigenous people.
- Right. Yeah, sure. - Yeah. Yeah. Uh- huh.
- That's good. - I love you guys.
- We love you, too. - We love you, sweetheart.
translation.es: - Y nosotros a ti. - Te queremos, cariño.

translation.en: - - Oh, God, what is happening?
- She has a life of her own now. - I'm so happy for her.
translation.es: - Ya tiene una vida propia. - Estoy feliz por ella.

translation.en: I'm so happy.
It's gonna be okay, babe. It's gonna be okay.
